message: OK, I'll go first. I'm building a metric Prusa Mendel. I just finished the frame. I also posted my first model on Thingiverse. I'm very excited to get my printer up and running.
I am! :) Need to assemble the hot head next week and start testing the electronics!
prusa Mendel metric also frame and wiring all done. hot end done and making a heated bed now too. too bad I can't get it to connect. lol
